ThingDef.label: archotech ship hull (unpowered)
ThingDef.description: The outer structural elements of an archotech-designed ship's hull. Does not include conduits for power or coolant.

ThingDef.label: archotech ship hull
ThingDef.description: The outer structural elements of an archotech-designed ship's hull. Includes conduits for power and coolant.

ThingDef.Name: ShipCornerArchotech
ThingDef.description: Angled armor for a ship's outer hull, designed by an archotech.

ThingDef.label: archotech solar generator
ThingDef.description: Uses photons to entangle itself with the star's photosphere, absorbing more energy than the sunlight alone would provide. Produces up to 1200W in space and 600W on planet surface. Does not work in the dark or under artificial light.

ThingDef.label: archotech ship vent
ThingDef.description: Exchanges heat with the coolant network, cooling or heating a ship's interior to the desired temperature.\n\nCan also heat rooms with electricity.

ThingDef.label: archotech ship airlock
ThingDef.description: Allows access to a ship or divides rooms inside it. Low-energy plasma barriers prevent gases from escaping.

ThingDef.label: archotech hull plating
ThingDef.description: Spaceworthy hull plating designed by an archotech.

ThingDef.label: antimatter thruster
ThingDef.description:
An advanced combat thruster capable of tremendous bursts of speed. Consumes exotic particles as fuel. Not suitable for atmospheric use.

Thrust: 9000
Fuel use: 1 exotic particle/s

ThingDef.label: antimatter reactor
ThingDef.description: Annihilates exotic particles to produce tremendous electrical power. It would not be a good idea to let this be damaged.

ThingDef.label: anti-entropic heatbank
ThingDef.description:
An advanced heatbank designed by an archotech. Uses exotic physics to convert excess heat back into usable energy. Slowly replenishes capacity from depletion even when cloaked.

Heat capacity: 200Hu
Heat conversion: 5Hu/s to 1kW/s

ThingDef.label: archotech shield generator
ThingDef.description:
An advanced shielding device which projects a momentum repulsor field. Shots can go out, but not in.

Generates 75% of a standard shield's heat when it blocks attacks. If no heatsink capacity is available, the shield will be damaged and require repairs.

Captains are advised to drop shields once coolant reaches very high temperature, or risk heatsink damage.

ThingDef.label: archotech spore
ThingDef.description:
An incubator for a mortal mind, either humanlike or machine, that has begun upgrading itself into an archotech.

The vast majority of its computational power is focused inward, contemplating its own structure and other unknowable mysteries, but enough is left over to serve as a ship's computer core.

Its mood can be improved by having colonists meditate nearby, or by sacrificing prisoners to it. Should its mood dip too low, it might decide to play "pranks."

Building more than one archotech spore will not produce gifts more frequently, but they will develop psychic field strength independently.

ThingDef.label: archotech uplink
ThingDef.description: Allows human researchers to collaborate with a fraction of your archotech spore's mind. Place near a high-tech research bench to unlock archotech projects. Each research bench can only use one uplink.

ThingDef.Name: ShipPillar
ThingDef.description: A complex and bizarre apparatus which serves no human-comprehensible purpose, but which will apparently advance the plans of your archotech spore in some way.\n\nThere is no benefit to building more than one copy of the same pillar.

ThingDef.label: spinal barrel: psychic flayer
ThingDef.description:
The final segment of a spinal-mount cannon. Fires a beam of directed psychic trauma that stuns crew and will likely cause brain damage. Ignores hull (but not shields).

Unlike other spinal weapons, the psychic flayer cannot damage your own ship.
Must be connected to a pilot/tactical console or AI core via the heat network.
Requires sufficient stored power and heat capacity to function.

ThingDef.label: spinal-mount cannon
ThingDef.description: Capital ship weaponry.

ThingDef.label: spinal barrel: disassembler
ThingDef.description:
The final segment of a spinal-mount cannon. A modified railgun which launches globs of disassembler mechanites.

Should be placed outside the ship, unless you want a new hole in your hull.
Must be connected to a pilot/tactical console or AI core via the heat network.
Requires sufficient stored power and heat capacity to function.

ThingDef.label: spinal-mount cannon
ThingDef.description: Capital ship weaponry.

ThingDef.label: mechanite cocktails
ThingDef.description: Glass bottles filled with disassembler mechanites. A favorite weapon of extremely advanced hooligans.

ThingDef.label: recyclotron
ThingDef.description: Uses mechanites to break down any object into its base materials, with near perfect efficiency.

RecipeDef.label: recycle
RecipeDef.description: Use mechanites to break down an object into its base resources, with near-perfect efficiency.

ThingDef.label: archotech ship radiator
ThingDef.description: Vents heat into the void at a physically-implausible rate, rapidly cooling a ship's interior. Also provides a small amount of heat capacity to weapons and shields. Cannot vent heat while shields or cloaking devices are active.
